

def main():
    tasks = int(raw_input(''))
    for t in range(tasks):
        n, c = map (int, raw_input('').split())
        alst = map(int, raw_input('').split())

        if sum(alst) <= c:
            print 'Yes'
        else:
            print 'No'

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
